name: Snowboard Champs
description:
Perform a perfect downhill in this special edition of Flick Champions Winter Sport!
This one will allow you challenge the world-best snowboarders, board to board! Will you groove your way to victory through the powder??


FEATURES:
► INSTANT PICK-UP AND PLAY, with easy to master controls
► Real-time, cross-platform Snowboard downhill!
► Individual or 2-Player mode
► Unique graphics style
► Global Ranking of the best (and worst!) Snowboarders
► Lightweight, smooth and User-friendly


Stay tuned for more online multiplayer sporting events, powered by Flick Champions ™!
